bibl.title: Further Notes on Myos Hormos and Tadnos Fons. With Some Remarks on a Station at Bir 'Aras, on an Ostrakon from El Heita and on Some Ruins at Bir Abu Darag.
bibl.note: Lettre privée, IIe siècle a.C. [rééditée par: David Meredith, The Myos Hormos Road: Inscriptions and Ostraca, ChrEg 31 (1956) No. 62, pp. 360-361 (= S.B. VI, 9166)].
Scaife C.H.O., Further Notes on Myos Hormos and Tadnos Fons. With Some Remarks on a Station at Bir 'Aras, on an Ostrakon from El Heita and on Some Ruins at Bir Abu Darag.
